name: wheel-of-fortune
description: A wheel of Forune as simple angular app.

scripts.start: npm run serve & npm run watch
scripts.serve: npm run copy && browser-sync start --config bs-config.js
scripts.watch: watchify lib/app.js --verbose -d -t [ browserify-ng-html2js --baseDir ./lib --requireAngular true ] -p [ css-modulesify -o dist/app.css --rootDir ./lib --jsonOutput dist/app.json ] -o dist/app.js
scripts.build: browserify -d -t [ browserify-ng-html2js --baseDir ./lib --requireAngular true ] -p [ css-modulesify -o dist/app.css --rootDir ./lib --jsonOutput dist/app.json ] lib/app.js | exorcist dist/app.js.map  > dist/app.js
